name: Pit: The Bite-Sized Shooter
description:
A little personal love letter to the FPSs of the early-mid 90s, featuring a variety of enemies and weapons to shoot them with. Levels can be completed in any order, and a robust list of cheats gives the player a lot of room to experiment and play around.

Visit my blog at http://ironsnowflakes.blogspot.com/ and follow me on Twitter at https://twitter.com/jefequeso
